release.action: FileServiceProvider implementations were moved to org.objectledge.filesystem package, as they are accessed by the casual users - they should not be forced to look into impl packages.

Implemented full support of "ledge" URL schema. Thanks to this, you can pass ledge://... URL strings as parameters to InputSource() constructors and have extenral entities and other variants of file inclusion work.
There is a problem though - only one handler for a specific schema may be present in a class loader at a time. This means that if you have two ledge filesystems active at the same time in a single classloader, you'll get inconsistent results - the last filesystem started winns.
